description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. If you like snake games, you might enjoy playing "Snaker Ace", which has 360 degree snaking movement, rival snakes, spiders, venom, maze mode play (with 100 patterns of increasing difficulty), survival mode, and local multiplayer-play mode for 2 to 4 players.  "Snaker Ace" game speed and difficulty levels can be modified to suit all ages and abilities.
